title: Sniper Rifle
summaries: The Sniper Rifle is a Hardmode, post-Plantera gun that fires a bullet with extremely high damage and velocity, though at a far slower rate of fire than most ranged weapons, and cannot auto-fire (except on the [img:Mobile version] Mobile version). It also has a "zoom" ability. The Sniper Rifle has a 1/12 (8.33%) / 23/144 (15.97%) chance of being dropped by Skeleton Snipers in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

The Sniper Rifle's "zoom" ability is functionally identical to that of the <linked>Binoculars</linked> and the <linked>Rifle Scope</linked> and its upgrades. It allows the screen to scroll temporarily in the direction of the cursor, essentially extending the viewing range in one direction.
Zoom is activated via one of the following methods:

• [img:Desktop version] Desktop version: Hold the right-click button.
  • [img:Console version] Console version: Hold the right stick.
  • [img:Mobile version] Mobile version: Tap-hold.
  • Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version: Move the C-Stick ([img:New Nintendo 3DS] users only).

The Sniper Rifle has a base (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 29% / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 19% critical strike chance, as opposed to the usual 4%. It is one of the few weapons lacking auto-fire on the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version.
